data.lyric:
[ti:I Like Me Better (Ruhde Remix)]
[ar:Ruhde/Lauv]
[al:I Like Me Better (Ruhde Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Like Me Better (Ruhde Remix) - Ruhde/Lauv
[00:02.86]Written by：Lauv
[00:05.73]To be young and in love in New York City
[00:07.84]
[00:10.66]To not know who I am but still know
[00:12.64]That I'm good long as you're here with me
[00:14.62]
[00:15.62]To be drunk and in love in New York City
[00:17.89]
[00:19.90]Midnight into morning coffee
[00:21.44]
[00:22.44]Burning through the hours talking
[00:23.75]
[00:25.93]I like me better when I'm with you
[00:27.94]
[00:30.92]I like me better when I'm with you
[00:33.08]
[00:35.93]I knew from the first time I'd stay for a long time cause
[00:40.88]I like me better when
[00:42.37]
[00:43.65]I like me better when I'm with you
[00:45.84]
[01:06.28]I don't know what it is but I got that feeling
[01:08.52]
[01:11.30]Waking up in this bed next to you swear the room
[01:13.88]Yeah it got no ceiling
[01:15.10]
[01:16.49]If we lay let the day just pass us by
[01:18.55]
[01:20.61]I might get to too much talking
[01:21.88]
[01:22.94]I might have to tell you something
[01:24.27]
[01:26.52]I like me better when I'm with you
[01:28.58]
[01:31.49]I like me better when I'm with you
[01:33.64]
[01:36.53]I knew from the first time I'd stay for a long time cause
[01:41.51]I like me better when
[01:42.82]
[01:44.18]I like me better when I'm with you
[01:46.36]
[02:06.59]Stay awhile stay awhile
[02:08.87]Stay here with me
[02:11.46]Stay awhile stay awhile oh
[02:14.26]
[02:16.51]Stay awhile stay awhile
[02:18.40]
[02:19.01]Stay here with me
[02:21.53]Lay here with me
[02:23.91]
[02:27.18]I like me better when I'm with you
[02:29.23]
[02:35.48]Yes I do yes I do babe
